---

# graph

Commit graph settings.


**Type:** attribute set of (submodule)

**Default:** `{ }`

## graph.compact

Enable compact graph columns.

**Scope:** <Badge type="tip"><i class="fa-solid fa-users"></i> Profile</Badge>

**Type:** boolean

**Default:** `false`

## graph.highlightRows

Highlight associated rows when hovering over a branch.

**Scope:** <Badge type="tip"><i class="fa-solid fa-users"></i> Profile</Badge>

**Type:** boolean

**Default:** `true`

## graph.lazy

Enable commits lazy loading.

::: info

Additional commits will be loaded when reaching the earliest commit in the graph.

:::

**Scope:** <Badge type="tip"><i class="fa-solid fa-globe"></i> Global</Badge>

**Type:** boolean

**Default:** `true`

## graph.maxCommits

Maximum number of commits to show in the commit graph. **Minimum value is 500.**

::: info

Lower counts may help improve performance.

:::

**Scope:** <Badge type="tip"><i class="fa-solid fa-globe"></i> Global</Badge>

**Type:** null or (positive integer, meaning >0)

**Default:** `2000`

## graph.showAll

Always show all commits in repository.

::: warning

This setting may cause performance issue with large repositories (like nixpkgs).

:::

**Scope:** <Badge type="tip"><i class="fa-solid fa-globe"></i> Global</Badge>

**Type:** boolean

**Default:** `false`

## graph.showAuthor

Show commit author.

**Scope:** <Badge type="tip"><i class="fa-solid fa-users"></i> Profile</Badge>

**Type:** boolean

**Default:** `false`

## graph.showDatetime

Show commit date/time.

**Scope:** <Badge type="tip"><i class="fa-solid fa-users"></i> Profile</Badge>

**Type:** boolean

**Default:** `false`

## graph.showDesc

Show commit description.

**Scope:** <Badge type="tip"><i class="fa-solid fa-users"></i> Profile</Badge>

**Type:** null or constrained string

**Valid values:**
- `always`
- `hover`
- `never`

**Default:** `always`

## graph.showGhostRefs

Show ghost branch/tag when hovering over or selecting a commit.

**Scope:** <Badge type="tip"><i class="fa-solid fa-users"></i> Profile</Badge>

**Type:** boolean

**Default:** `true`

## graph.showGraph

Show commit tree.

**Scope:** <Badge type="tip"><i class="fa-solid fa-users"></i> Profile</Badge>

**Type:** boolean

**Default:** `true`

## graph.showMessage

Show commit message.

**Scope:** <Badge type="tip"><i class="fa-solid fa-users"></i> Profile</Badge>

**Type:** boolean

**Default:** `true`

## graph.showRefs

Show branches and tags.

**Scope:** <Badge type="tip"><i class="fa-solid fa-users"></i> Profile</Badge>

**Type:** boolean

**Default:** `true`

## graph.showSHA

Show commit SHA.

**Scope:** <Badge type="tip"><i class="fa-solid fa-users"></i> Profile</Badge>

**Type:** boolean

**Default:** `false`

## graph.useAuthorInitials

Use author initials instead of avatars.

**Scope:** <Badge type="tip"><i class="fa-solid fa-users"></i> Profile</Badge>

**Type:** boolean

**Default:** `false`

## graph.useGenericRemoteIcon

Use generic remote icon instead of hosting service icon.

**Scope:** <Badge type="tip"><i class="fa-solid fa-users"></i> Profile</Badge>

**Type:** boolean

**Default:** `false`
